description: This file is a Vitest configuration file for setting up testing environment options within a Vue project, merging base Vite configurations with specific test settings.

methods.name: mergeConfig
methods.description: Merges multiple configuration objects into a single configuration.

methods.name: defineConfig
methods.description: Defines a resolved configuration object for Vitest.

methods.name: configDefaults
methods.description: Provides default configuration settings for Vitest.

methods.name: fileURLToPath
methods.description: Converts a URL object to a file system path string.
